templates.subject: Ready2Race - Complete registration
body: Hello ##recipient##,
A user account for Ready2Race should be created under this email address.
If you did not initiate this yourself, please ignore this email!
To complete your registration, please click on the following link or copy it into the address bar of your web browser.
##link##
Please note that registration can only be completed within 24 hours!

templates.subject: Ready2Race - Invitation
body: Hello ##recipient##,
You have been invited by ##sender## to use Ready2Race.
To accept your invitation, please click on the following link or copy it into the address bar of your web browser.
##link##
Please note that accepting the invitation is only possible for 7 days!

templates.subject: Ready2Race - Reset Password
body: Hello ##recipient##,
We received a request to reset your password.
If you did not initiate this yourself, please ignore this email! Your password will not be changed.
To reset your password, please click on the following link or copy it into the address bar of your web browser.
##link##
Please not that resetting the password is only possible within 24 hours!

templates.subject: Ready2Race - Event registration confirmation for ##event##
body: Hello ##recipient##,
Thank you very much for your registration for our event (##event##), which we hereby confirm receipt of.
You can still make changes to the registration using your access until the registration deadline.
Your current registration for ##club## summarized:
Registered participants:
##participants##
Registered competitions
##competitions##
Attached to this email you will find all relevant documents again.

templates.subject: Ready2Race - Invoice for ##event## registration
body: Hello ##recipient##,
Thank you very much for your registration (##event##).
You will find the corresponding invoice as an attachment (please pay before ##date##).
We look forward to seeing you.

templates.subject: Ready2Race - Eintragung Challenge Ergebnisse
body: Hello ##recipient##,
You have been registered for a challenge at the event '##event##'.
You can enter your results yourself during the relevant deadlines via the following link.
##link##
We look forward to your participation.
